composio-core.reason: Transitive high vuln in composio-core — no fix available without breaking downgrade

xlsx.reason: Prototype Pollution + ReDoS in sheetJS — transitive via zerox; no patched version available

zerox.reason: Inherits xlsx vulnerability — zerox depends on xlsx for document parsing

@sentry/nextjs.reason: Transitive via @sentry/webpack-plugin → webpack chain; build-time only, not exploitable at runtime

@sentry/webpack-plugin.reason: Transitive via webpack; build-time dependency only

cacache.reason: Transitive via tar → node-gyp → make-fetch-happen chain; build-time only

make-fetch-happen.reason: Transitive via node-gyp → cacache chain; build-time dependency

mem0ai.reason: Transitive via sqlite3 + @qdrant/js-client-rest; server-side only, not user-facing

node-gyp.reason: Transitive via sqlite3 → tar chain; build-time native compilation tool

serialize-javascript.reason: Transitive via terser-webpack-plugin; build-time only, not processing untrusted input

sqlite3.reason: Transitive via mem0ai; server-side memory store, not exposed to untrusted tar archives

tar.reason: Transitive via node-gyp/sqlite3/cacache; build-time only, not processing untrusted archives

terser-webpack-plugin.reason: Transitive via webpack → serialize-javascript; build-time bundler plugin
